ARABIC: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'This is your reward. Your striving is fully acknowledged.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This in truth is your recompense, and acceptance of your endeavours."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Behold, this is your recompense and your endeavour has been appreciated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This will be their reward and their efforts will be appreciated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will be said to them, “This is your reward – indeed your efforts have been appreciated.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (And it will be said to them): "Verily, this is a reward for you, and your endeavor has been accepted."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely this is a reward for you, and your striving shall be recompensed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Behold, this is a recompense for you, and your striving is thanked.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it will be said unto them): Lo! this is a reward for you. Your endeavour (upon earth) hath found acceptance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is your reward. Your endeavour is fully acknowledged.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this is for you by way of recompense, and your endeavour hath been accepted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [They will be told]: ‘This is your reward, and your efforts have been well-appreciated.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily this is a Reward for you, and your Endeavour is accepted and recognised."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (And it will be said to them): "Verily, this is a reward for you, and your endeavour has been accepted."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: See, this is your recompense, your striving is thanked'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “This is a reward for you. Your efforts are well appreciated.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:22] ‘Verily this, bliss, is a reward for you, and your endeavour has been appreciated’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! This) which I have described to you of food, drink and raiment (is a reward for you) is a reward from Allah. (Your endeavour (upon earth) hath found acceptance) your works were accepted and made to grow.
